modShortDescription: This mod contains statues and fountains. At the fountain you can fill up your water supply with the bucket or with the glass.
modDescription:
This mod contains statues and fountains. At the [fountain](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-building-materials/) you can fill up your water supply with the bucket or with the glass.

You just have to copy the contents of the zip file (Lichtis Statue Fountains folder) into your Mods folder.

**[Download](http://217.79.178.78/Lichtis_Statue_Fountains.zip)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/18012-lichti%C2%B4s-modlet-for-alpha-18/).

**Credits:** Steven73
